      • fd

        public static java.lang.String fd(double i,
                                  int p)
        Formats a double's decimals to a limit, however, this will add zeros to the decimal places that dont need to be placed down. 2.4343 formatted with 6 decimals gets returned as 2.434300
        Parameters:
        i - the double
        p - the number of decimal places to use
        Returns:
        the formated string
